title: Lily Allen dating Stranger Things star David Harbour and leaving UK
text:
They've been linked since August when they were spotted on a theatre date in London's West End.

And Lily Allen confirmed she was officially dating David Harbour, 44, on Monday, by sharing a picture of The Stranger Things star's bulging biceps during his Saturday Night Live hosting gig, captioning the image 'Mine'.

The 34-year-old star's loved up social media posts came just one day after the unlikely duo were pictured kissing on the street in New York City.

It's official: Lily Allen, 34, confirmed she was dating David Harbour, 44, on Monday, by sharing a picture of The Stranger Things star and captioning it 'Mine'

Lily and David had been seen ogether a number of times over the last few weeks, including a date night at the Hughie Fury vs Alexander Povetkin boxing match at London's O2.

The Smile hitmaker now seems to have made things social media official, signalling they are exclusively dating.

She had supported David during his SNL hosting debut on Saturday night and was even spotted leaving the show alongside the actor's family.

The London-based star also hinted she was going to stay with David in America until the Brexit deadline of October 31 when the UK is due to leave the European Union.

His number one fan: She uploaded a screengrab of David's bulging biceps from his Saturday Night Live hosting gig over the weekend

By his side: She had supported David during his SNL hosting debut on Saturday night and was even spotted leaving the show alongside the actor's family

Loved up: The happy couple put on an amorous display as they stepped out in New York's SoHo area on Sunday afternoon

Sharing a number of selfies of herself, the singer wrote: 'Leaving UK till after Brexit. Good Luck Kids. Also what's the most annoying engagement baiting question caption you've read ? LMK in the comments'.

David is believed to have split from Fantastic Beasts star Alison Sudol earlier this year following a long-term romance.

Lily separated from husband Sam Cooper in 2015 after about four years marriage, finalising their divorce in 2018.

Joining him in the USA: The London-based star also hinted she was going to stay with David in America until the Brexit deadline

They share joint custody of their two daughters Ethel, seven, and Marnie, six, and remain 'really friendly' to this day.

During an interview on Loose Women back in 2018, she said: '[Our custody agreement] wasn't really something we discussed, we're both really friendly, our kids go to school equidistant between our houses, so it works.'

Amid their separation, the songstress dated grime DJ MC Meridian Dan, real name Daniel Lawrence London.

Out and about: Later into the day, Lily was pictured puffing on a cigarette during a solo outing at Manhattan's Downtown area

Reflective: The songstress injected a hint of her signature flair into her look with circular-framed mirrored shades

Brief break: The media personality enjoyed some downtime on her mobile phone during her low-key appearance

The pair first started dating three years ago and the Smile hitmaker told How To Fail podcast host Elizabeth Day that she and Dan had broken up in December 2018.

She said at the time: 'I'm single, for the first time since I was about 15. I've just come back from a tour in America, which is where I was when things went wrong with Sam, and the same thing happened in my current relationship.

'I mean, I didn't take lots of drugs and have lots of sex with other people. I just became very lost.'
